    119. 
          
          
                ##
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                # Runs before every test, before setup. This hook is meant for
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                # libraries to extend minitest. It is not meant to be used by
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                # test developers.
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                #
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                # As a simplistic example:
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                #
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                #   module MyMinitestPlugin
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                #     def before_setup
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                #       super
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                #       # ... stuff to do before setup is run
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                #     end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                #
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                #     def after_setup
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                #       # ... stuff to do after setup is run
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                #       super
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                #     end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                #
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                #     def before_teardown
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                #       super
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                #       # ... stuff to do before teardown is run
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                #     end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                #
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                #     def after_teardown
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                #       # ... stuff to do after teardown is run
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                #       super
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                #     end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                #   end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                #
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                #   class MiniTest::Test
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                #     include MyMinitestPlugin
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                #   end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                def before_setup; end
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                ##
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                # Runs before every test. Use this to set up before each test
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                # run.
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                def setup; end
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
          
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                ##
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                # Runs before every test, after setup. This hook is meant for
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                # libraries to extend minitest. It is not meant to be used by
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                # test developers.
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                #
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                # See #before_setup for an example.
        
      166.

              end # LifecycleHooks
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
              def capture_exceptions # :nodoc:
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          12
          
                yield
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              rescue *PASSTHROUGH_EXCEPTIONS
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                raise
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
              rescue Assertion => e
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                self.failures << e
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              rescue Exception => e
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                self.failures << UnexpectedError.new(e)
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
              end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
          
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
              def with_info_handler &block # :nodoc:
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          3
          
                t0 = Minitest.clock_time
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
          
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          3
          
                handler = lambda do
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                  warn "\nCurrent: %s#%s %.2fs" % [self.class, self.name, Minitest.clock_time - t0]
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                end
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          3
          
                self.class.on_signal ::Minitest.info_signal, handler, &block
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
              end
        
      213.

          unless defined?(Minitest) then
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            # all of this crap is just to avoid circular requires and is only
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            # needed if a user requires "minitest/unit" directly instead of
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            # "minitest/autorun", so we also warn
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
            from = caller.reject { |s| s =~ /rubygems/ }.join("\n  ")
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            warn "Warning: you should require 'minitest/autorun' instead."
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            warn %(Warning: or add 'gem "minitest"' before 'require "minitest/autorun"')
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            warn "From:\n  #{from}"

    12.
